text: Settimo San Pietro (Sètimu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 6,755 people lived there. Its area is 23.29 km². It is 70 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Settimo San Pietro
